pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:7.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:7.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc89:10.6: nahāyati. Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, nahānapariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
